summary: I created this mod to add some usefulness to the Blood Cursed Arrows (besides shooting them at the sun). Like the Sunhallowed Arrows, I added an AOE damage with some bloody visuals to go with it. Now you can either shoot them at the sun or do some serious cursed damage to your foes.
descriptionHtml:
I created this mod to add some usefulness to the Blood Cursed Arrows (besides shooting them at the sun). Like the Sunhallowed Arrows, I added an AOE damage with some bloody visuals  to go with it. Now you can either shoot them at the sun or do some serious cursed damage to your foes.

*Requires Dawnguard


[b]Changes:[/b]

[b]Full Version Includes -[/b]

1. Added AOE (absorb health) damage and visual effects to the Blood Cursed Arrows.

2. Added \'Friendly condition\' to AOE damage.

3. The arrows have no effect on the undead or dwemer automatons (only normal arrow damage).

4. Removed Sun damage from Auriel\'s Bow when using Blood Cursed Arrows. The bow has been  corrupted when using the cursed arrows and does not function as the gods intended. 

5. Added \'Arrow\' and \'Bolt\' prefixes to all Dawnguard ammo for easier sorting.

6. Added unenchanted versions of the Sunhallowed and Blood Cursed arrows (Auriel\'s Elven Arrows & Blood Elven) to the forge under \'Elven\' smithing (Will retexture them at a later date).

7. Increased enchantment for bow. Didn\'t have enough magical charges IMO.

8. Increased Blood and Sun Arrow projectile speed from 3600 to 4000.



[b]Blood Cursed Version Includes -[/b]

1. Added AOE (absorb health) damage and visual effects to the Blood Cursed Arrows.

2. Added \'Friendly condition\' to AOE damage.

3. The arrows have no effect on the undead or dwemer automatons (only normal arrow damage).

4. Removed Sun damage from Auriel\'s Bow when using Blood Cursed Arrows. The bow has been  corrupted when using the cursed arrows and does not function as the gods intended. 

5. Added \'Arrow\' and \'Bolt\' prefixes to all Dawnguard ammo for easier sorting.

6. Added unenchanted versions of the Sunhallowed and Blood Cursed arrows (Auriel\'s Elven Arrows & Blood Elven) to the forge under \'Elven\' smithing (Will retexture them at a later date).



[b]Change Log:[/b]

1.3 - Added separate file without bow enchantment modifications and projectile speed. Removed bow damage increase from both files. Misc fixes.


1.2 - Balanced Damage and reduced absorb effect. Added \'Slow\' 50% to targets.

1.1 - Added unenchanted Blood Cursed arrows, updated bow damage, increased projectile speed, changed arrows to absorb health damage.

1.0 - Initial release.

Don\'t forget to endorse! ;)


[b]Installation: [/b]

1. Use NMM installer.
2. Install manually by adding AurielsArrows.esp to Skyrim/Data folder.


[b]Uninstall:[/b]

1. Deactivate with NMM.
2. Remove AurielsArrows.esp from Skyrim/Data folder.


[b]Credits:[/b]

 Bethesda for the wonderful game and excellent modding tools and Nexus for giving us a place to showcase them.
